description:
Seaquant, like Zebro, is an employee of the Zaoldyecks that cleans after Mike. He is a former Blacklist Hunter who tried to get into the estate with a hundred men but was all stopped single handedly by Canary; Seaquant was a sole survivor of the ordeal and was under the employment of the Zaoldyecks ever since.
Source: hunterxhunter.wikia
name: Seaquant
